tooltips.help:
Enter the defect ID in the test box. The result shows defects which are similar to the defect. Also you related test cases,source code and knweledge documents can be seen
example : Enter defect no"2746"
tooltips.title: Similar search Tab

tooltips.help:
Please fill in the description or key words of title of the defects.
Example" enter "upload feature not working"
You can get the details of defects which are similar to these.
tooltips.title: Context Search Tab

tooltips.help: Search the context of the defects using advanced connectors like AND / OR
tooltips.title: advance search Tab

tooltips.help: Please enter the file name to search for similar files
Click on this tab to find the files which should be focus for debugging.
tooltips.title: Localize defect

tooltips.help: This shows the list of test cases which are similar to the defects entered.
This shows the list of defects which are similar to the defects entered.
This shows the source code which are relevant to the defects entered.
Get the knowledge documents to know more about the defects and how is was resolved earlier
tooltips.title: Knowledge Doc Tab
